charges.charge_description: 21:846=NP.F CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS NARCOTICS and 18:2 Aid and Abet (1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of seventy-two (72) months. The defendant shall surrender for service of sentence at the institution designated by the Bureau of Prisons to before 2:00 p.m. on 8/27/98. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of five (5) years. The defendant shall pay a total fine in the amount of $164,000.00. Schedule of payments. Statement of reasons. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) knowingly distribute cocaine, a Schedule II controlled substance.
